remarks: Midpoint of a null segment.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ismid.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismid.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
ismid.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
ismid.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
ismid.1 $e |- ( ph -> G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) $.
midcl.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
midcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
midid $p |- ( ph -> ( A ( midG ` G ) A ) = A ) $.
